Contact Us About Us About Us NS Towers 2025-06-05T12:33:07-04:00 About Us We are a Full Service Real Estate Company specializing in residential, condos, co-ops, rentals, commercial and relocation services. We meet all your real estate needs from New York City to Long Island. As of January 2017, North Shore Towers become a smoke-free building. North Shore Towers is a complex of three 33-story buildings with over 1,844 units on 110 luscious acres. Among its unique amenities are an 18-hole golf course, five har tru lighted tennis courts, heated indoor and outdoor pools, a movie theater, indoor shopping arcade, restaurants, and so much more. Because we are the Only On-Site Broker at North Shore Towers ‚Äì We know Better. We are seasoned and resourceful. Sit down with us for a few minutes, and ask us your questions. You will be glad you did. Why Choose Linda Meet Our Team Get in touch Office: 718.423.3130 Mobile: 516.850.3135 Fax: 718.423.1403 Email: LRappaport@NSTowers.com 27240 Grand Central Parkway Building 2 Floral Park, NY 11005 Linda D. You also have the option to opt-out of these cookies. But opting out of some of these cookies may have an effect on your browsing experience.                                     Baths 1,282 SqFt 212 DOM Residential MLS¬Æ # A4637873 1 2 Next Arrow right University Park Country Club Homes and Villas for Sale University Park Country Club is one of the premier master planned golf course communities in the Sarasota area.¬† University Park Country Club has been ranked as one of the top Florida golf courses with 27 holes of championship golf.¬†¬†University Park Country Club and Homes for Sale University Park Country Club has been awarded "The Best Development in the Region" by the Tampa Bay Regional Planning Council and has been awarded "Best Community Design in America" by the National Association of Homebuilders.¬† Designed by golf course architect, Ron Garl, University Park offers a semi-private membership for its 27 holes of championship golf,¬† as well as 11 har-tru lighted tennis courts, fitness center and outstanding clubhouse.¬† Learn more by visiting their website at University Park Country Club . Interested in learning more about Sarasota Golf Course Real Estate? Contact us online or call 941-586-4790 for more information about buying and selling a home on a Sarasota golf course and other communities in the Sarasota area. Welcome to University Park - University Park Community Association ‚Ä¢ Country Club ‚Ä¢ Recreation District ‚Ä¢ Homeowner Login Home History Governance Assn Mgmt Info Arch & Landscape Lifestyle Real Estate & Renter Info Contact Us Select Page University Park Community Association University Park is a gated, master-planned residential community with 1,202 single family lots in thirty-two (32) distinct neighborhoods. We are recognized as one of the pre-eminent mature communities in our area, offering one of the most unique and sought-after locations in southwest Florida. The scenic natural beauty covers over 1,200 acres filled with tranquil ponds, soaring moss-covered oaks and lush landscaping creating a park-like setting. Homeowners feel removed from the bustling activity just outside the gates while enjoying a vibrant and active recreational and social lifestyle. Whether you are new to University Park or one of our long-standing homeowners, the information contained on this site will provide valuable knowledge that will enrich your life in this extraordinary community. Search for: Up to Date NEW! Issue 2 ALC Regulations Revised regulations approved by the Board of Directors on April 17, 2025! Electronic Notice Authorization Blue Consent Form Online Voting Authorization Pink Opt-in form We proudly invite you to Experience University Park! Beyond the stunning beauty, premier location and outstanding amenities that come with home ownership, residents enjoy lifestyle experiences and opportunities to engage socially that set us uniquely apart and offer significant benefits to our homeowners. University Park is a private, residential community and recognized as one of the pre-eminent mature communities in the Bradenton/Sarasota area.¬† It is gated with limited access, in addition to being manned 24/7 by on-site staff.¬† There is also a back exit/entrance gate at Honor√© Avenue activated by a radio frequency identification (RFID) decal affixed to vehicles for the convenience of our residents and Country Club members only. Our community is governed by two volunteer resident boards who oversee the planning and operation of the community and the Country Club.¬† Our community association boasts a strong balance sheet with substantial audited reserves and focused management of ongoing infrastructure improvements and upgrades that include a recent complete overhaul of our gate operating systems with easier access for our residents and visitors!¬† In 2023, the Country Club added to its dining facilities with a three million dollar ($3,000,000) expansion which includes a new outdoor bar and caf√©.¬† The twenty-seven (27) hole golf course, the crown jewel of University Park, will shortly undergo major enhancement to ensure its continued rating among the best in southwest Florida. WELCOME!¬† And enjoy the on-site EXPERIENCE of University Park! Thirty-two (32)¬† ¬† Unique Neighborhoods Our award-winning, planned and gated community features 1,202 lots located in thirty-two (32) unique, enclave neighborhoods, each carefully planned with most home settings featuring either golf course, water or conservation area views with privacy a priority. Lush, tropical landscapes abound featuring ‚Äúgreen‚Äù and open spaces. Eaton Place Eaton Place is at the center of the Park with easy access to the Club. There are eighty-six (86) homes in the neighborhood from 2,700 to 3,200 square feet. ‚Ä¶ Grosvenor Gardens Located near the entrance of University Park, Grosvenor Gardens features twenty-nine (29) custom homes in one and two-story designs, ranging in size from 3,000 to 4,500 square feet on footprints of one-third acre or more. ‚Ä¶ Chelsea The Chelsea neighborhood is an intimate enclave of nine (9) spacious, custom homes located near the rear entrance of University Park.¬† Home sizes range from 4,000 to nearly 6,000 square feet, all having pools under large lanais with water views. ‚Ä¶ ‚Äì View all neighborhoods Community Information Booklet Perhaps our most requested document for real estate professionals and those considering purchasing in University Park is our expansive Community Information Booklet.¬† This comprehensive guide to University Park includes valuable information on our community, country club and recreation district in one comprehensive publication which is easy to access and print. View Community Information Booklet Updated 2021 Rich History In late 1980 local developer, Pat Neal, and international entrepreneurs, Rolf and Barbara Pasold, purchased three hundred (300) acres of pristine low pine flatwoods owned by State Farm insurance agents that was used as a hunting preserve.¬† Painstaking planning of this 1,202 lot master-planned community took nearly five (5) years and the developers‚Äô commitment to the preservation of the natural beauty of the property is still evident today and a tribute to the founding fathers. Learn More Exceptional Lifestyle University Park residents enjoy a vibrant and socially engaging lifestyle just minutes from the arts and dining in downtown Sarasota and world class beaches and recreation including Nathan Benderson Park.¬† Club membership brings residents together on the golf course, tennis and pickleball courts and dining at our soon to be completed, fully renovated Clubhouse. Explore Lifestyle 8301 The Park Boulevard University Park, FL¬† 34201 Get Directions Office Hours Monday - Friday:¬† 9am - 4pm Office closed weekends Contact Us 941.355.3888 pbm@upcai-fl.com For Realtors Community Information Booklet HOA Documents Homeowner Links Country Club Recreation District HOA Login Get Social Follow Follow Follow ¬© University Park Community Association, Inc.

About Us ‚Äì University Park RD Skip to content About Us Calendar Meetings Financials Archives Connect About Us Calendar Meetings Financials Archives Connect About Us About Us Board Members District Staff Finance Committee Strategic Planning Committee Explore UPCC About Us Board Members District Staff Finance Committee Strategic Planning Committee Explore UPCC The University Park Recreation District was formed by Manatee County on August 2, 2018 to purchase, operate and maintain the University Park Country Club and its related facilities along with +/- 100 acres of conservation and open space land in the District. Establishment Manatee County formed the University Park Recreation District via Ordinance 18-29 pursuant to Chapter 418, F.S. based on a petition signed by over 80% of District residents requesting the formation of the District. Ordinance 18-29, amended by Ordinance 23-95 PDF | RTF Legal Description PDF | RTF District Boundaries Map PDF | RTF Mission, Vision, Values Our Mission: Deliver to members and guests ever evolving lifestyle experiences that are engaging and inclusive by providing exemplary service, facilities and amenities. Our Vision: To be the preeminent gathering place for members and guests to meet, socialize and enjoy lifestyle¬† opportunities that exceed their expectations in a modern club environment, that also enhances our residential community. Our Core Values: Values that are truly important direct the decision we make, define our character, and preserve what is special about our Club. They are: Integrity, Trust & Mutual Respect ‚Äì Acting ethically in the best interests of our members, staff and community. Quality ‚Äì Striving to be the best that can be in all that we do. Fiscal Responsibility and Transparency ‚Äì Openly communicating our financial position and ensuring that operating budgets and reserves are sufficient to meet the current and future needs of the Club. Environmental stewardship ‚Äì Commitment to preserving our natural landscape and considering the environmental impact of our decisions. Stay Informed on All The
District News: Receive Timely Updates, Board Meeting Reminders & Essential Community News Sign Up Here Contact Information Please feel free to contact the District Office in writing, via email or fax, or by phone, whichever is most convenient for you. See CONNECT for further details on contacting the District Office. University Park - Naples Golf Homes | Naples Golf Guy Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ‚Äôs Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog Property Search Golf Communities Naples Bonita Springs / Estero Fort Myers Greater Sarasota Bundled Equity Luxury Buyers Sellers Discover SWFL FAQ‚Äôs Dinning & Entertainment Shopping Beaches Calendar of Events Golf Accommodations Healthcare Arts & Attractions About Us Naples Golf Guy Team Downing Frye Realty Contact Us Testimonials Blog 239.370.0892 info@naplesgolfguy.com Back to Greater Sarasota Golf Communities University Park University Park Country Club is a private golf club located in Florida. This private Sarasota area golf community features 27 holes of championship golf designed by Ron Garl. In addition to the course, the club offers excellent practice facilities. As such, there is a driving range, short game practice area with putting and chipping greens practice bunker. Additionally, this fabulous Florida country club has been rated four stars by Golf Digest since 1996. While open to the public, members are able to book tee times 10 days in advance compared to 3 days for the general public. In addition to golf, members have access to 11 Har-Tru Tennis Courts, Pickleball, Croquet and State-of-the-Art Fitness Center. Finally, members will enjoy a wide variety of social activities, a full-service restaurant, and bar via The Park Grille & Cafe, perfect for a leisurely lunch or elegant dinner. The community offers a wide array of properties, in all there are 1200 villas and homes spread throughout 32 distinct neighborhoods.
